Articles.Content:
Its really hard to build, so I decided to keep it small. I put an engine in the back so that it can fly. The real one has the engines in the little tanks on the wings, but the engines are too big and upscaling it would make it weirder. Its strangely stable and when you pitch down aggressively, it will stall, but it recovers surprisingly quickly. Here you go, its not one if my best creations:
